europeana:record.dc:title: Preliminary checklist of Cetacea in the Indonesian Archipelago and adjacent waters
Zoologische Verhandelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Rudolph P.
Smeenk C.
Leatherwood S.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Mammalia
Cetacea; Indonesia; Malaysia; Brunei; Singapore; Indian Ocean; Pacific Ocean.
europeana:record.dc:description: Records of 29 species of cetaceans from the Indonesian Archipelago have been gleaned from published and unpublished sources, representing five families: Phocoenidae (1 species), Delphinidae (16), Ziphiidae (3), Physeteridae (3), and Balaenopteridae (6). The presence of 26 species could be confirmed by material in museum collections, photographs or documentation by specialists. The occurrence of three species is still unconfirmed.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Preliminary checklist of Cetacea in the Indonesian Archipelago and adjacent waters (URN:ISSN:0024-1652) (Volume 312) (Issue 1)
